sentence.text: After hours of exhilarating exercise in the bracing Highland air , what could be more relaxing than the pampered luxury and soothing ambience of the Country Club ?
Something more soothing would present itself .
In any case Babur himself finds Stuart 's adventures very soothing .
Keelan was a soothing presence beside him .
The coolness of the window was soothing to his over-heated nose .
Newman 's tone was soothing , controlled .
They are soft and soothing as they cover my body
As I say , his reply was most soothing .
Supposedly acting as a healing herb , it presumably also heats the needle to give an additional , soothing effect .
The assumed humility seemed to have a soothing effect upon Major Tzann .
Melissa tea has calming and soothing effects , relieves tiredness and helps headaches .
When touched by an adult mouse , a young mouse emits a special ultrasonic call that seems to have a soothing effect on the adult .
It was a pleasant , organised kitchen and the purpose of a regular , everyday task had a soothing , therapeutic effect on Robyn .
I have read in Ideal Home that a tip to help sell a house is to brew coffee or play soothing classical music when prospective buyers are viewing , but I disagree with this .
He looked like a man who needed a quiet evening , an easy chair , a drink , and soothing music unlike the vibrant strains of the rock number that reached them .
Nurse Bodkin bustled over to her and put her arm around her shoulder , making soothing noises and easing her into a sitting position on the bed .
Everything was cool and green and peaceful and the plashing of the water soothing after the noise and petrol fumes of the bus ride .
He dozed off with the familiar , soothing noise of Firelight 's hay-chomping over his head .
His soothing voice reduced her screams to a quieter moaning , and she huddled on the floor against the bed in a pathetic foetal position .
It led Marguerite on to the art of cooking , and Jenna was content to sit and listen to the soothing sound of her voice .
Tiny bubbles rise up through the darkness and a soothing voice calls the audience into the sight room .
` I can see you did n't approve , sir , " he said in a soothing voice .
I 'm not asking for a few soothing words to calm my conscience ; if I can , I want to help .
With soothing words , she comforted Mandy .
I was a proper wife , ever ready with a hot bath and a soothing word for my weary provider .

She was dimly aware of someone -- or something ? -- brushing the wet tears from her face , of hard yet comforting arms enfolding her trembling body as a low deep voice murmured soothing words of comfort .
` Do n't speak unless you have to , " Duncan said , his voice soothing to the man on the bed .
Suddenly there was a strong arm around her shoulders and a woman 's voice in her ear murmuring something incomprehensible but soothing in Dari .
Mr Prescott 's rough-edged style conveys a sense of honest indignation , where soothing strokes of eloquence might seem insincere .
Its soothing atmosphere is ideally suited to those artists whose work has the power of illumination , synthesising matter and thought : Spalletti , Mucha , Therrien , Baumgarten .
She fumed in silence , turning her gaze towards the soothing vista of river and fields , and the brightly coloured assortment of rafts that bobbed gently on the water .
Finally Sophie had to stop her clients from giving their ineffectual help , and then Helen with her calm , soothing manner proved invaluable .
Gillian put a soothing hand on Lily 's arm .
We oldies can find digging soothing and satisfying , even enjoyable -- particularly if we take it in small doses and choose good weather and soil conditions .
And Robert , in some moods , found the company of boys under ten both soothing and stimulating .
